remarks: The predicate "is a lattice plane" for join of atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2012.)
statement:
islpln2a.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
islpln2a.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islpln2a.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islpln2a.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
islpln2a $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( Q e. A /\ R e. A /\ S e. A ) ) -> ( ( ( Q .\/ R ) .\/ S ) e. P <-> ( Q =/= R /\ -. S .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) ) $.
